title: Daddy's Stepstalker
description: He’s been Daddy since he won me my first stuffie at a carnival booth.Even when he married her and became unavailable.For years Daddy Shaw’s all I’ve ever wanted.But he still sees me as the innocent boy he took in.It's a giggle how sweet he thinks I am.He has no idea of the things I have done.Of how I've stalked him…...fantasized about him... killed for him.Will he still think of me as his little angel when he finds out I'm rotten to the core?
author: Gianni Holmes
